subtitles.text: Good evening, I'm Kiho Onuma, Rina Machida and Edana Mori from Sakurazaka46!
Sakurazaka46's Youtube channel is now open!
I'm so happy! Thank you so much!
It looks like we can do all kinds of things we want to do.
Aren't you excited? I don't know...
I'm so excited!
I want to say so many things!
To celebrate the opening of YouTube, we will be broadcasting live on May 4!
Yay!
A live broadcast!
I hope you are looking forward to it as well. Thank you very much.
And you are working on something, right?
Oh, that's right.
To commemorate this line,
I am making a mask.
I've been allowed to make masks,
It's fun.
I think it will be played after this video,
You feel like you're making it now?
Right now, in between gigs.
In between shows.
We're working on it right now during the tour.
I'm really looking forward to it.
Is it pretty much done?
Yes, it is.
It's just starting to come down.
It's coming down.
It's coming down.
I'm about to start on the illustrations.
I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm looking forward to it.
There's the cutest little guy.
Come here.
Come here. Where do you think I should go?
I don't know.
Is this it?
Yes, this is it.
Miya and Shizuki are here.
Hey! They are cute kids.
I want to try something like this.
I want to have a big-eating contest.
That's good! You said you can eat.
I wonder who can.
I'm certainly curious.
I've had ramen.
That's good!
I've seen it!
We have a lot to look forward to, so I hope you will subscribe to our channel,
We will also have a live broadcast on May 4, so please subscribe to our channel so you don't miss it.
Please subscribe to our channel so you don't miss it.
Oh, and please click the "Good" button.
Please give us a "Good" button, too.
